abstract: Pres Obama lifts sanctions against Myanmar, citing government for significant progress in human rights; move comes despite continuing international criticism of Mynamar's  campaign to drive out Rohingya Muslim minority.

headline.print_headline: Obama Lifts Some Sanctions on Myanmar
headline.main: Obama Lifts Some Sanctions Against Myanmar

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The low-key announcement came despite the fact that Myanmar’s army is in the midst of a brutal campaign to drive out the Rohingya, a Muslim minority....
lead_paragraph: The low-key announcement came despite the fact that Myanmar’s army is in the midst of a brutal campaign to drive out the Rohingya, a Muslim minority.
